description: fol. 65b-106a. 222 x 167; 160 x 93 mm. 23 lin. Rajab 1145. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 510 (no. 30); S II, 528: Itmām al-niʻmah...; the title al-Niʻmah... also in Baghdādī, Īḍāḥ al-maknūn, II, 661 and the mss. Cairo² V, 394 and VIII, 269. Incip.: ... الحمد لله اتم الحمد ... اما بعد فلما کانت لىلة الاحد
author: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1503-approximately 1566
title: al-Niʻmah al-kubrá ʻalá al-ʻālam bi-mawlid sayyid wuld Ādam
creator: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1503-approximately 1566
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
